properties.name: Better Foliage
properties.description: Better Foliage is a Forge mod that will make your Minecraft worlds more impressive, mainly by improving how vegetation looks. Disabling this may imrpove performacnce, however, it can also be disabled through the in-game Mod config editor.

properties.name: Dynamic Surroundings
properties.description: Dynamic Surroundings alters the playerâ€™s visual and audible experience in Minecraft, and does not alter game mechanics.

properties.name: World Stripper
properties.description: This mod assists in modpack development and debugging.

properties.name: Sound Physics
properties.description: Sound Physics is a mod that overhauls Minecraft's sound engine to simulate reverberation, sound occlusion/absorption, and physically based sound attenuation. The sound simulation provides interesting aural cues; you'll be able to tell whether a mob can be directly seen and whether it's just around the corner or in a closed-off area with your eyes closed. Exploring caves is much more immersive, and reverberation provides a sense of scale to grand structures or large underground ravines.

properties.name: Realistic Clouds
properties.description: Extremely realistic clouds, sunsets, sunrises, moon and sun.

properties.name: MrMeepz Shaders v05
properties.description:
The Goal of this Shaderpack is to create a Happy and Summer - like Atmosphere, which is archieved trough bright and warm colours. Since 2013 I've been using those colours in my Shaderpack and they have become the
''Special Feature'' that many people connect with this Shaderpack.

properties.name: KUDA Shaders v6.5
properties.description: KUDA-Shaders v6 is designed to have nice graphics, fast, customizable and to be playable. The last version of KUDA-Shaders has plenty of options you can mess around with. See dedelner.net for more information.

properties.name: World Edit
properties.description: World Edit for single player. Includs CUI.

properties.name: Loot Bags
properties.description: No longer on the official server. They're pretty borken.
